description:
## Description

We should create an Issue Template for the Mifos X Web App project. The template should ask the following:

1. Description
2. Steps to reproduce
3. Expected behaviour
4. Observed behaviour
5. Settings
  1. Mifos X version
  2. Browser used
6. Screenshots, if any

We should place the same in `.github` folder under the root directory.

## References
The following link explains how to create an Issue Template:
https://help.github.com/articles/creating-an-issue-template-for-your-repository/
name: Mifos X Web App - Create an Issue Template for the project
